traits.name: Spellcasting
traits.desc: Iarno is a 4th level spellcaster who uses Intelligence as his spellcasting ability (spell save DC 13; +5 to hit with spell attacks). Iarno knows the following spells from the wizard's spell list: * Cantrips (at will): light, mage hand, shocking grasp * 1st Level (4 slots): charm person, magic missile * 2nd Level (3 slots): hold person, misty step

actions.name: Quarterstaff
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +1 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 3 (1d8 - 1) bludgeoning damage.
